channel.title: Help :S first server
channel.description:
How do i add owner ? to my acc
server is 639

item.title: Help :S first server
item.dc:creator: @Nelson_x Nelson_x
item.description:
@Nelson_x wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:3, topic:431200”][quote author=Reverse Hate link=topic=533878.msg3902867#msg3902867 date=1327939655]
Open your character’s file, search “owner” you should see something like <owner>0</owner>change that to 1 so it will be <owner>1</owner>and save. This is for like 659 I think so it shouldn’t be to different.
For your first server I personally would recommend that you do a 317 but whatever have fun learning on a 639 >.>
[/quote]

If you use dementhium or Eclipse 639 go actionsender.java and find

Than just set your name in the “” place.[/quote]

thx very helpful

Read full topic

item.title: Help :S first server
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

Chaotic-Madness:

I would recommend you to start on 317, and go on 639 later, it can be alittle hard to learn 639.

True, i recommend to use delta or something, it is the basics of coding and they will be easyer than 639.

Read full topic
